content.rendered:
The West London Regional and Micro-Competition events (Westminster Academy) have been postponed.

We apologise for the short notice, and for any inconvenience caused. The events will be rescheduled for later in the year, and further details will be posted here. All other events are unaffected. Any queries should be sent Dr Fiona Larner (f.larner@uksdc.org).

excerpt.rendered: The West London Regional and Micro-Competition events (Westminster Academy) have been postponed. We apologise for the short notice, and for any inconvenience caused. The events will be rescheduled for later in the year, and further details will be posted here. All other events are unaffected. Any queries should be sent Dr Fiona Larner (f.larner@uksdc.org).
